custom_fields.assessment_structure: Participation in class in discussions and work put into the assigned activities/submissions.
custom_fields.goals: To become familiar with the Japanese arts and crafts. To implement the learned techniques to express yourself.
custom_fields.relevance: As a wielder of immense soft power, Japan attracts a great amount of international interest regarding its traditional arts and pop culture.

long_desc: In this highly interactive mini course, students will familiarize themselves with the Japanese culture and history through collaborative activities like relaymanga serialization, karaoke video shooting with all the drama and CMUQthemed karuta making. Unleash your creativity, express yourself and destress in the framework of Japanese culture, all the while learning more about this beautiful and interesting culture
name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Creative Expression Through Japanese Culture
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Creative Expression Through Japanese Culture
